text: The Kia Stonic is a subcompact Crossover SUV made by Kia since 2017. == History and Features == The Kia Stonic made its debut at the International Auto Show Germany in 2017 its the smallest SUV on Kia`s lineup the name Stonic is derived from the words speedy and tonic. it has 1.0 1.2 and 1.4 liter gasoline engines and 1.6 diesel engines and it has a mild hybrid version. and has 5-speed and 6-speedmanual transmission a 6-speed automatic transmission and a 7-speed CVT transmission in 2020 it was facelifted. == Markets == The Kia Stonic is currently sold in Europe Australia Brazil and New Zealand. in South Korea it was Discontinued in 2020 due to poor sales. in China its sold as the Kia KX1. the KX1 was exported to the Philipines under the name Stonic. the Kia Stonic in Philipines was sold until 2024 when it was replaced by the Kia Sonet. == References == Stonic Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Kia Stonic
